title: Airwheel S6 Mini Self-Balancing Scooter Makes Travel Wonderful
text: Airwheel S6 Mini Self-Balancing Scooter Makes Travel Wonderful Recently, Airwheel has published a new product-S6 mini self-balancing scooter on the basis of previous two-wheeled electric scooter and sitting-posture electric scooter. Such an innovated S6 gives people a wonderful travel. USA, 26 October 2015 -- Airwheel is the number one in intelligent self-balancing electric scooter world. In the meantime, it is always working on innovating and upgrading products. Recently, Airwheel has published a new product-S6 mini self-balancing scooter on the basis of previous two-wheeled electric scooter and sitting-posture electric scooter. Such an innovated S6 gives people a wonderful travel.The very first impression of Airwheel S6 is the mini size, but its comprehensive performance is never inferior to other electric scooters of Airwheel. On the contrary, the small figure makes Airwheel S6 more flexible and convenient. In the middle of two pedals, there is a retractable aluminum alloy shaft and a leather saddle. Such a design paves the way for two riding modes: standing-posture and sitting-posture riding modes. During the riding process, if users are fatigued by standing for a long time, they can lift the shaft and sit on the saddle. Meanwhile, the two pedals also have been designed delicately. On the one hand, the natural rubber pedals are soft and thus make two feet comfortable. On the other hand, the pedals also have shock-absorbing function, which guarantee stable and smooth riding. Besides comfortable and flexible riding, controlling Airwheel S6 mini electric scooter is quite easy because of exclusively-designed APP that can be downloaded from official website and installed in the phone. When it comes to the meaning of the APP to users, it can be concluded into two aspects. In the first place, users can get to know the real-time states of Airwheel S6 from their phone clearly, such as current speed, battery, temperature, electric current and voltage. Secondly, users can adjust and control Airwheel S6 via the phone directly, including correcting the horizontal and vertical states, locking or unlocking, GPS and turning on or off the lights. What is more, Airwheel S6 has a strong support from big-capacity battery. All in all, Airwheel S6 gives people a go-as-you-please travel. Terrific! # # #
